messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] conference, was: Question about SC from a lurker
messages.msgSnippet: Wouldn t that be wonderful! Myranda Me too,  you think maybe some tv station will cover it? Ok,,,Kelli s little dream world again. Kelli Myranda wrote:I sure
messages.messageBody:
Wouldn't that be wonderful!
Myranda

Me too, you think maybe some tv station will cover it?
Ok,,,Kelli's little dream world again.
Kelli

Myranda wrote:I sure hope you guys going to the conference will talk about it lots and lots when you get back!!! I want to know alllll about it! LOL
Myranda


Sure! Come on out! But not until after the conference.

Maybe you should take your neighbor cookies, and offer to help him, tell him
stories about how cool your kids are and ask if he'd like you to come over
EVERY day to reassure him about homeschooling! He'll say no. <g>

Sandra
